code: "use client";import"./StockCard.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const StockCard=_ref=>{let{stock,price,onSubscribe,onUnsubscribe,isSubscribed}=_ref;const priceChange=(Math.random()-0.5)*10;const isUp=priceChange>=0;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"stock-card ".concat(isSubscribed?"subscribed":""),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"stock-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"stock-symbol",children:stock}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"stock-status ".concat(isSubscribed?"active":""),children:isSubscribed?"✓ Subscribed":"Not Subscribed"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"stock-price-section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"stock-price animate-pulse-price",children:["$",price.toFixed(2)]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"stock-change ".concat(isUp?"positive":"negative"),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:[isUp?"↑":"↓"," ",Math.abs(priceChange).toFixed(2),"%"]})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"stock-actions",children:isSubscribed?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>onUnsubscribe(stock),className:"btn btn-unsubscribe",children:"Unsubscribe"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>onSubscribe(stock),className:"btn btn-subscribe",children:"Subscribe"})})]});};export default StockCard;

sourcesContent:
"use client" import "./StockCard.css" const StockCard = ({ stock, price, onSubscribe, onUnsubscribe, isSubscribed }) => { const priceChange = (Math.random() - 0.5) * 10 const isUp = priceChange >= 0 return (
{stock}
{isSubscribed ? "✓ Subscribed" : "Not Subscribed"}
${price.toFixed(2)}
{isUp ? "↑" : "↓"} {Math.abs(priceChange).toFixed(2)}%
{isSubscribed ? ( ) : ( )}
) } export default StockCard
